Text: Just wanted to say that this is an awesome collection of works you've uploaded here.  Can't thank you enough. Don't let the trolls bother you. I think more than 90% of people don't think for themselves by doing their own research, but merely compare what they believe to what other people believe. We truly do seem to live in a world of sheep, and we draw criticism when we refuse to follow the sheep. So, again thank you, and keep whatever you have coming =)
